lead_paragraph: A day after announcing it will shut down next month, Revel Casino Hotel told a bankruptcy court judge it is still negotiating with potential buyers.

headline.main: Revel Casino Still Talking With Potential Bidders
headline.print_headline: Revel Casino Still Talking With Potential Bidders
